title: Will appoint new PM and Cabinet this week: Prez
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa said he would take steps within this week to appoint a Prime Minister and a Cabinet, who could win the majority support of Parliament and the confidence of the people.
Addressing the nation, he said he would take steps to reinforce the provisions of the 19th Amendment to the Constitution so that more powers would be transferred to Parliament.
